title: Google\Cloud\Redis\V1\MaintenancePolicy
name: MaintenancePolicy
description:
Maintenance policy for an instance.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.redis.v1.MaintenancePolicy

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.create_time
params.description: Output only. The time when the policy was created.

params.name: data.update_time
params.description: Output only. The time when the policy was last updated.

params.name: data.description
params.description: Optional. Description of what this policy is for. Create/Update methods return INVALID_ARGUMENT if the length is greater than 512.

params.name: data.weekly_maintenance_window
params.description: Optional. Maintenance window that is applied to resources covered by this policy. Minimum 1. For the current version, the maximum number of weekly_window is expected to be one.
